page.title: 19TRANSPORT,CONT.
page.content:
The local bus services will take you to Southwick,Shoreham,Newhaven, Westdene,Hangleton,Woodingdean, Portslade Station,Hove,and along the coastal road.Taxi ranks are scattered around Brighton,and if you are not near one of these,you can telephone one,and there are sevaral taxi firms in the area.Coaches can be hired at quite a large cost,and trains are quite quick and economical,although a recent train strike has meant several disruptions,but now they are getting back to normal.
{By Gary Christer.
